    • createGameboard

      public void createGameboard(int rows, int columns, int snakes, int ladders, String symbolPlayer1, String symbolPlayer2, String symbolPlayer3)
      It creates a gameboard with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      rows - number of rows
      columns - number of columns
      snakes - number of snakes
      ladders - number of ladders
      symbolPlayer1 - The symbol that represents the first player.
      symbolPlayer2 - The symbol that will be used to represent the second player.
      symbolPlayer3 - String
